card.name: Woods of the Sleeping Fairies
card.text: If you have at least 1 play points, and you have played more than 2 cards this turn, Choose: Play this card as either a Yawn of the Fairies or a Fairies Awakened. ---------- Countdown (2) At the end of your turn, add a Fairy card into your hand.

card.name: Yawn of the Fairies
card.text: Countdown (2) At the end of your turn, select a random enemy follower. It can't attack until after the end of the opponent's turn.

card.name: Fairies Awakened
card.text: Countdown (2) Whenever an enemy follower attacks your Leader, deal 1 damage to it.

card.name: Utopian Fairy
card.text: Fanfare: Enhance (5): Give an allied follower +1/+2. Restore 3 Defense to your Leader.

card.name: Sutera of the Sacred Bow
card.related: Sutera of the Sacred Bow EVOLVED
card.text: Fanfare: Draw a card. Evolve: Whenever this follower attacks, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers

card.name: Sutera of the Sacred Bow EVOLVED
Shamu and Shama, Noblekins
card.text: Fanfare: Choose - Put either a Shamu's Antics or Shama's Gaze into your hand

card.name: Shamu's Antics
card.text: Deal 2 to an enemy follower. Restore 2 Defense to your Leader.

card.name: Shama's Gaze
card.text: Give enemy follower -X/+0 until the end of the opponent's turn. X equals the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Korwa, Ravishing Designer
card.text: Fanfare: Give your Leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, add a Fil into your hand. Put 2 Fils into your hand instead if at least 4 damage was dealt to your Leader during your opponent's previous turn. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match).

card.name: Fil
card.text: Give an allied follower +0/+1. If at least 4 other Fils in this match, that follower can attack twice per turn.

card.name: Latham, Honorable Knight
card.text: Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Knights. ---------- Fanfare: Give your Leader the following effects - Whenever an allied follower attacks and there are no allied Knight in play, summon a Knight. Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 Play Point comes into play, give it Storm. (These effects are no stackable and last for the rest of the match).

card.name: Dei, Secret Agent
card.text: Fanfare: Choose: Put either an Evyn, Novice Agent or an Infiltration into your hand. ---------- Ambush.

card.name: Evyn, Novice Agent
card.text: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower

card.name: Evyn, Novice Agent EVOLVED
card.text: Storm

card.name: Infiltration
card.text: Draw cards until you have X cards in hand. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's hand.

card.name: Dragon Knights
card.text: Choose: Summon a Vane, Indominable Knight; a Siegfried, Dragonslayer; a Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy; or Percival, Lord of Flames.Enhance (8): Choose 2 of those followers instead.

card.name: Vane, Indominable Knight
card.text: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0 and restore 3 Defense to this follower.

card.name: Siegfried, Dragonslayer
card.text: Bane. Ward

card.name: Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy
card.text: Storm. Whenever this follower attack, gain +1/+1 if an allied Vane, Indominable Knight is in play.

card.name: Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy
card.text: Storm. Whenever this follower attack, gain +1/+1 if an allied Vane, Indominable Knight is in play.

card.name: Percival, Lord of Flames
card.text: Gain Rush if an allied Siegfried, Dragonslayer is in play. Whenever this follower attacks, gain +X/+0. X equals to the number of other allied followers in play.

card.name: Sellsword Lucius
card.text: Fanfare: Enhance (5): Destroy an enemy follower.

card.name: Charlotta, Tiny Justice
card.text: Evolve: Until the end of your opponent's turn, all allied followers take no damage from spells and effects

card.name: Tycoon
card.text: Fanfare: Enhance (7): Gain +3/+3. Then draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand.

card.name: Tanya, Shadow Enforcer
card.text: Ambush. Bane.

card.name: Princess Teena
card.text: At the end of your turn, put a random 1 Play Point Swordcraft follower from deck into play.

card.name: Despondant Chimera
card.text: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower if this card has been spellboosted at least 6 times. Then recover 3 Play Points if this card has been spellboosted at least 9 times. Then gain Storm if this card has been spellboosted at least 12 times.

card.name: Black Witch Anna
card.text: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower

card.name: Black Witch Anna EVOLVED
card.text: Last Words: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower

card.name: Grand Spire
card.text: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Earth Rite: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower instead, and then 1 damage to the enemy Leader.

card.name: Peacemaker
card.text: Accelerate (2): Draw a card. ---------- Ward.

card.name: Adramelech
card.text: Accelerate (3): Draw 2 cards. ---------- Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of non-follower cards you've played this match.

card.name: Pyrewyrm Commander
card.text: Fanfare: Put a Blazing Breath into your hand. Evolve: Put a Lightning Blast into your hand.

card.name: True Dragon Scathach
card.text: Fanfare: If Overflow is not active, deal 2 damage to this follower and add an empty Play Point Orb. If Overflow is active, give your leader the following effects - Subtract 2 fom the next source of damage dealt to your Leader.

card.name: Aliza, Pugilist Princess
card.text: Rush Fanfare: If Overflow is active, gain Clash - Gain +1/+1

card.name: Dragon Sanctum
card.text: If you have at least 3 play points, and Overflow is active for you, Choose: Play this card as either a Trample or a Whirlwind. ---------- Countdown (1) Fanfare: Add an empty Play Point Orb.

card.name: Trample
card.text: Countdown (1)Fanfare: Destroy a random enemy follower.

card.name: Whirlwind
card.text: Countdown (1) Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.

card.name: Dragon Huntress
card.text: Whenever this follower attacks a follower with at least 5 Attack, gain Bane.

card.name: Albacore
card.text: Last Words: Restore 3 Defense to your Leader.

card.name: Mordecai, Eternal Duelist
card.text: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Evolve this follower. Evolve this follower if it was summoned using Reanimate

card.name: Mordecai, Eternal Duelist EVOLVED
card.text: Last Words: Summon an unevolved Mordecai, Eternal Duelist

card.name: Plagued City
card.text: Countdown (2) Fanfare: Transform all followers into Zombies. Whenever a follower (excluding Zombie) comes into play, transform it into a Zombie.

card.name: Lady Grey, Deathweaver
card.text: Drain. Evolve: Reanimate (2)

card.name: Fran, Monster Girl
card.text: Fanfare: Choose - Put either a Fran's Attendant or a Fran's Curse into your hand. Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Put a Fran's Attendant and a Fran's Curse into your hand.

card.name: Fran's Attendant
card.text: Fanfare: Necromancy (6): Gain +2/+2 and Rush.

card.name: Fran's Curse
card.text: Deal 4 damage to an allied follower and enemy follower. (This card can only be played when both a targettable allied follower and enemy follower are in play.)

card.name: Sarunan, Cursebound Lover
card.text: Fanfare: Necromancy (6): Remove all effects from an enemy follower except changes to its Attack or Defense.

card.name: Narmaya, Ephmeral Blade
card.text: Bane. Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower. Deal damage to your leader until their defense drops to 10 if Vengeance is not active for you.

card.name: Pommern, Erste's Pride
card.text: Ward

card.name: Pommern, Erste's Pride EVOLVED
card.text: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to this follower.

card.name: Alexandrite Devil
card.text: Fanfare: Choose: Put either a Blue Fire Stone or a Red Fire Stone into your hand.

card.name: Blue Fire Stone
card.text: Countdown (2) Fanfare: Draw 2 cards. Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your Leader.

card.name: Red Fire Stone
card.text: Countdown (2) Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower. Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your Leader.

card.name: Restless Parish
card.text: If you have at least 2 play points, Choose: Play this card as either a Night Fall or a Madness Revealed. ---------- Countdown (1) Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your Leader. Last Words: Draw a card.

card.name: Night Fall
card.text: Countdown (2) At the end of your opponent's turn, summon a Forest Bat.

card.name: Madness Revealed
card.text: Countdown (1) Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to your Leader. Last Words: Restore 8 Defense to your Leader.

card.name: Hazen, Priest of the Wind
card.text: Ward

card.name: Hazen, Priest of the Wind EVOLVED
card.text: Doesn't have Ward

card.name: Priest of Retribution
card.text: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.

card.name: Sophia, Pious Pilgrim
card.text: Evolve: Randomly summon a copy of an follower that has been destroyed this turn.

card.name: Themis' Purge
card.text: Banish all followers.

card.name: Loreena, Holy Priest
card.text: Evolve: Choose - Put a Loreena's Holy Water or a Loreena's Punch into your hand.

card.name: Loreena's Holy Water
card.text: Restore 2 Defense to an ally. Draw a card.

card.name: Loreena's Punch
card.text: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of your strongest followers in play.

card.name: Jessica, Cheerful Cannon
card.text: Fanfare: Give an allied Portalcraft follower +1/+0. If that follower can be targeted, your enemy can only target that follower.

card.name: Captivating Conductor
card.text: Select 2 followers in play. Deal X damage to the first follower and deal Y damage to the second follower. X equals to the Attack of the second follower and Y equals to the Attack of the first follower. (This card can only be played when 2 targetable followers are in play).

card.name: Artifact Spark
card.text: Transform an Artifact card in your hand into an Artifact Spark. Deal 4 damage to enemy Leader. (This card can only be played when a targetable Artifact is in your hand.)

card.name: Silva, Argent Sniper
card.text: Accelerate (3) - Put a follower card that originally costs 3 Play Point or less from your hand into play. It gains Rush. Give your Leader the following effects - On each fo your turns, deal 1 damage to enemy Leader the first time an allied follower attacks. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match) ---------- Ambush
